name: hugo-bootstrap-starter-template
description: Hugo theme based on the Bootstrap starter template project
author: Marcelo Canina <me@marcanuy.com>

scripts.css-compile: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/style.scss static/css/style.css
scripts.build: yarn run css-compile && yarn run build:jquery && yarn run build:popper
